comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The sun., February 05, 1915, Page 9 chroniclingamerica.loc.gov/lccn/sn83030272/1915-02-05/ed-... reports that next Tuesday afternoon, Mrs. Theodore Roosevelt Jr. and others would be offering toys made by women and children of Brittany. The event was described as a dramatic tea and fête. This could be that event.

comment.author: 47061292@N02
comment._content: Time Is Passing,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.,.. And Still  We Are Here !!!!!!!And One Time We Have To Go Too.
